alert.note: Alert for Black Mesa Area; Grand Canyon Country; Kaibab Plateau; Little Colorado River Valley in Coconino County; Marble and Glen Canyons; Northeast Plateaus and Mesas Hwy 264 Northward; Western Mogollon Rim (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 22 at 2:57AM MST until January 23 at 5:00PM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM THIS EVENING TO 5 PM MST MONDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 8 inches above 5000 ft with 1 to 2 inches below 5000 ft inches. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...Areas near Doney Park, Flagstaff, Fredonia, Grand Canyon, Jacob Lake, North Rim, Page, Shonto, Tuba City and Williams. * WHEN...From 6 PM this evening to 5 PM MST Monday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions will impact the Monday morning commute. Snow forecast from 6 PM Today to 5 PM Monday: Doney Park 5 to 9 inches Flagstaff 4 to 6 inches Fredonia 0 to 1 inches Grand Canyon 1 to 3 inches Jacob Lake 3 to 5 inches North Rim 4 to 8 inches Page 1 to 2 inches Shonto 1 to 3 inches Tuba City 1 to 2 inches Williams 1 to 3 inches .
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
